title: Your Glyph Tag is a single identity to share with your friends, forums, and games. Once created, your Glyph Tag cannot be changed, so make it count!
glyphTagMessage: Your Glyph Tag cannot be changed once set.

rules.rule: can only contain letters A thru Z, a thru z
cannot contain accented characters. e.g., é, ñ
numbers are allowed, but not as the first character of your Glyph Tag.
